Package au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.column

Class DecimalRepresentation

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.column.ColumnRepresentation
au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.column.DefaultRepresentation
au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.column.DecimalRepresentation
public class DecimalRepresentation extends DefaultRepresentation
Describes a representation of a decimal value, which includes:
  • The value itself
  • The original scale of the value
Author:
John Grimes
